name: Synapticure
headline: We deliver personalized medicine for neurodegenerative  patients
description:
Personalized virtual clinical care is finally here for neurodegenerative diseases like Alzheimer's and related Dementias (Cognitive), Parkinson's and Huntington's (Movement), and ALS (Movement).

We provide a novel approach to care in these diseases, centering a patient and caregiver around a coordinator who quarterbacks patients through our full Multi-Disciplinary Care Resources to local aid, PT/OT and home health support. When you leave our clinic, it's not with a handful of paper referrals, but with our coordinators helping you book and find the best physicians, DME, trials, and even cheapest prescriptions. We are devoted to helping patients, from guidance on care and insurance to providing the full spectrum of investigational and clinical testing to improve outcomes. 

Synapticure was built by leading patient and caregiver advocates alongside leading  clinicians, biotech executives and telemedicine executives to bring the neurodegenerative disease care and treatment experience into the 21st century, and is backed by the leading Venture funds and Angel investors in the remote health and life sciences space.

founders.name: Peter Wallach, Founder
founders.description: Founder / Founding CEO, SynaptiCure Inc. Eternal optimist. Recovering Bain consultant and avid baseball fan.

founders.name: Brian Wallach, Founder
founders.description: Brian Wallach is an attorney and ALS patient. In the aftermath of his diagnosis in November 2017, he and his wife founded I AM ALS, a patient-led, patient-centric movement to lead the fight for a cure to the disease. Wallach is also an associate at the law firm Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP. From 2014 to 2018, he served as an assistant United States attorney in the Northern District of Illinois. From 2011 to 2013, he was senior vetting counsel in the Obama White House.

founders.name: Martina de Majo, Founder
founders.description: Martina is the director of research and development at Synapticure and she focuses on creating iPSC derived in vitro models to study neurodegenerative disorders. Martina received an undergraduate degree in biotechnology and a Master's degree in pharmaceutical biotechnology from the University of Rome "La Sapienza" (Italy), she then earned a PhD in clinical neuroscience from King's College London (UK) and deepened her knowledge of iPSC derived modelling in her postdoc at UCSF (US)

## Available in all 50 states
We accept most insurance plans
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/65e5f34e44c28830570a08de_Medicare.svg)
[LEARN MORE](http://www.synapticure.com/</patient-forms/insurance-request>)
## Why Synapticure is different
### 24/7 Access
Designed to support patients, caregivers, and families, we're here for you 24/7
[READ MORE](http://www.synapticure.com/<#>)
### Quick appointments
Neurologists when you need them from the comfort of your home vs the 4-6 month average wait
[READ MORE](http://www.synapticure.com/<#>)
### Personal care navigator
A dedicated nurse or social worker helps coordinate everything you need to provide support, education, and be your advocate
[READ MORE](http://www.synapticure.com/<#>)
### Caregiver support
We work around your schedules to ensure everyone can join key appointments. If desired, we offer caregiver education and support
[READ MORE](http://www.synapticure.com/<#>)
### Experts on Clinical Trials
Our neurologists and Care Navigators take the time to discuss your priorities, review various trials, and talk through the science
[READ MORE](http://www.synapticure.com/<#>)
![Brian and Sandra Wallach hugging](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/645972c5c19e76806bd4d2de_Abrevaya-Wallach.jpg)
Our co-founders, Brian Wallach and Sandra Abrevaya, have been living with ALS for more than 6 years
## Founded by a patient and caregiver living with ALS
Our co-founders, Brian Wallach and Sandra Abrevaya have been living with ALS for more than 6 years. As innovative leaders in the community, they took their expertise in policy and healthcare reform to change the care system for neurodegenerative diseases.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/664f79f1e6b18611b89cc782_Amazon_Prime_Video_logo.svg)](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.nytimes.com/2022/02/01/business/als-synapticure-startup.html?partner=slack&smid=sl-share>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/641b298ace667427c7e0b968_NYT.svg)](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.nytimes.com/2022/02/01/business/als-synapticure-startup.html?partner=slack&smid=sl-share>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/65e7506719d7ff61d94d0c47_cbs-news-sunday-morning.svg)](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.cbsnews.com/news/fighting-the-good-fight-against-als-amyotrophic-lateral-sclerosis/>)
[See the documentary](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.synapticure.com/blog/cbs-sunday-morning-fighting-the-good-fight-against-als-lou-gehrig>)[Read their story](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.synapticure.com/blog/cbs-sunday-morning-fighting-the-good-fight-against-als-lou-gehrig>)
## From Advocacy to Action: 
## Meet the co-founders of Synapticure
Our co-founders, Brian Wallach and Sandra Abrevaya have been living with ALS for more than 6 years. Discover the journey of 'No Ordinary Campaign' and how I AM ALS and Synapticure are revolutionizing care for patients and caregivers.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/6650c40c9a7be2ca8192081d_Amazon_Prime_Video_logo-white.svg)](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.primevideo.com/detail/For-Love-Life-No-Ordinary-Campaign/0G4JL1A2VHABKNJH8MD5352MYW>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/6650c8deafa6189b25e0b4c6_NewYorkTime-white.svg)](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.nytimes.com/2022/02/01/business/als-synapticure-startup.html?partner=slack&smid=sl-share>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/6650c7dd48d083368794179d_cbs_sunday_morning-white.svg)](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.cbsnews.com/news/fighting-the-good-fight-against-als-amyotrophic-lateral-sclerosis/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/6650cbe869468d338bd078a8_Today-white.svg)](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/www.today.com/video/new-doc-tells-emotional-story-of-couple-s-journey-with-als-211307077827>)

## Your Partner In Expert Telehealth Neurodegenerative Care
Providing care for ALS, Parkinson’s, Huntington’s, Alzheimer’s and other Dementias. We partner with you to ensure your patients have access to personalized care, when they need it.
[Explore Partnerships](http://www.synapticure.com/</for-partners/partners>)
### Featured Partner:Pearl Health
Synapticure is proud to partner with Pearl Health to bring world-class dementia care to Medicare patients and caregivers. Through the CMS GUIDE program, we’re offering access to expert neurologists, cutting-edge treatments, and much-needed caregiver support—all from the comfort of home.
[Read More](http://www.synapticure.com/<http:/www.synapticure.com/blog/synapticure-and-pearl-health-partner-to-provide-breakthrough-support-for-dementia-care>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/615f376480c21d051b7cb882/66c65ec8d935c03f825086a6_Pearl.jpg)

If you are interested in becoming a Synapticure patient, please [click here](http://www.synapticure.com/<https:/my.synapticure.com/onboarding/signup>) to schedule a call with one of our care coordinators who can answer your questions. If you have other questions, please write to us here and we will get back to you soon.

## NOTICE TO PATIENTSOPEN PAYMENTS DATABASE
For informational purposes only, a link to the federal Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) Open Payments web page is provided here. The federal Physician Payments Sunshine Act requires that detailed information about payment and other payments of value worth over ten dollars ($10) from manufacturers of drugs, medical devices, and biologics to physicians and teaching hospital be made available to the public. You may search this federal database for payments made to physicians and teaching hospitals by visiting this website: [https://openpaymentsdata.cms.gov/](http://www.synapticure.com/<#>)

### 24/7 Access

## Founded by a patient and caregiver living with ALS
Our co-founders, Brian Wallach and Sandra Abrevaya have been living with ALS for more than 6 years. As innovative leaders in the community, they took their expertise in policy and healthcare reform to change the care system for neurodegenerative diseases.

## NOTICE TO PATIENTSOPEN PAYMENTS DATABASE
For informational purposes only, a link to the federal Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) Open Payments web page is provided here. The federal Physician Payments Sunshine Act requires that detailed information about payment and other payments of value worth over ten dollars ($10) from manufacturers of drugs, medical devices, and biologics to physicians and teaching hospital be made available to the public. You may search this federal database for payments made to physicians and teaching hospitals by visiting this website: https://openpaymentsdata.cms.gov/⟨14⟩

generated_description:
**Synapticure: Revolutionizing Neurodegenerative Care**

Founded in 2019 and accelerated through Y Combinator's Batch S20, Synapticure is on a mission to redefine how neurodegenerative diseases are managed. Based in Chicago, IL, this health-tech startup focuses on providing personalized virtual clinical care for patients experiencing conditions such as Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, Huntington's, and ALS.

### What Makes Synapticure Different?

Synapticure offers a holistic and integrated approach to patient care. When you engage with them, you don't just receive referrals; you gain access to a personal care coordinator who will assist you in navigating the healthcare maze. This person—be it a nurse or social worker—will help you book appointments, locate specialized physicians, participate in clinical trials, and find the best medication pricing. The goal? To streamline the often overwhelming healthcare experience for both patients and their caregivers.

### A Team Built on Real Experience

What sets Synapticure apart is its leadership duo: Brian Wallach and Sandra Abrevaya, who have been living with ALS for over six years. Their personal experience as advocates in the healthcare space informs the very structure and mission of Synapticure. The team, which comprises 35 dedicated employees, collaborates closely with leading patient and caregiver advocates, clinicians, and biotech experts to ensure that their offerings remain deeply relevant and impactful.

### Key Services Offered

- **Personalized Neurodegenerative Care**: Tailored telehealth sessions for Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, Huntington’s, and ALS.
- **Care Coordination**: Comprehensive support that includes clarifying insurance processes and facilitating genetic testing.
- **Access to Clinical Trials**: Synapticure's neurologists are equipped to guide patients through investigational therapies to potentially improve outcomes.
- **Payer Partnerships**: By collaborating with providers such as Pearl Health, Synapticure is expanding access to affordable care across the United States, while recognizing the importance of supporting caregivers as well.

### Why Telehealth Works Here

In a landscape where traditional health systems often fail to meet the needs of neurodegenerative patients—frequently bookending support with long waits and inconsistent communication—Synapticure stands out. They promise quick, no-cost virtual consultations, 24/7 availability, and a commitment to treating patients with empathy and understanding. 

Accessible in all 50 states and accepting most insurance plans, Synapticure is a vital resource for both patients and families looking for support in managing complex health needs.

### Explore More

If you're interested in Synapticure's services or would like to learn more about this innovative healthcare model, you can visit their website at [Synapticure](http://www.synapticure.com). Here, you can schedule consultations and discover an array of resources aimed at enhancing the lives of those dealing with neurodegenerative diseases.

**In a world where the healthcare experience can feel disjointed and impersonal, Synapticure stands as a future-forward solution, making personalized care not just an ideal but a reality.**
